entry.title: Fwd: Your bit4coin order
entry.summary: The email is regarding the purchase of a bit4coin voucher, claiming that the wallet has been successfully added. The total amount, including shipping and handling, is â‚¬193.00. Payment is requested via (SEPA) bank transfer to bit4coin BV's ABN AMRO account with reference number 1WZ. The email advises to track the payment and states that the recipient will be informed as soon as the payment is received. The email also provides a support email address for any questions or concerns. The sender suspects that this is a fraud and would like to report it, acknowledging that there may not be anything that can be done to stop such scams.
